moves.name: Breaking Swipe
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents and lowers their Strength by 1 on a successful hit.

moves.name: Clanging Scales
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. After use, the user's Vitality is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Core Enforcer
moves.effect: If the target has already acted this turn, its Ability is suppressed.

moves.name: Devastating Drake
moves.effect: Z-Move. Base power depends on the original move.

moves.name: Dragon Breath
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Dragon Dance
moves.effect: The user raises its Strength and Dexterity by 1 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Dragon Rush
moves.effect: High chance to miss. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Dragon Tail
moves.effect: Forces the target to switch out with another Pok√©mon in their party. Has negative Priority.

moves.name: Eternabeam
moves.effect: The user cannot act on the next turn.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.effect: The user attacks for 2-3 turns, then becomes Confused.

moves.name: Roar of Time
moves.effect: The user cannot act on the next turn.

moves.name: Twister
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches. Damage is doubled against targets using Fly or Bounce.
